document_data.name: Hazaufein Oblodra
document_data.deathnotes: (Fell into an abyss with whole family)
document_data.mainbody: '''Hazaufein Oblodra''' was the House Wizard of [[House Oblodra]] and Elderboy of [[Matron Mother]] [[K'yorl Odran]] circa [[1358 DR]].
document_data.Personality: Hazaufein was often mocked by his brother [[Drizfryn Oblodra]], who said that his ability to craft was the result of being part-[[dwarf]], but Hazaufein always accepted these jests with a wan smile.
document_data.Powers: Hazaufein was a very good crafter of [[magic item]]s.
document_data.Activities: The position of house wizard was often given little consideration among the psionically powered Oblodras. Hazaufein's main duty was to create magical arms and armors for the house's warriors.
